comment.body:
`https://animesdigital.org/video/a/116110/` after clicking on player it goes to `sabornutritivo.com` which needs

```adb
sabornutritivo.com#%#//scriptlet('no-setTimeout-if', 'hasAdblock')
```

Also for the link in the issue description:

```adb
ricasdelicias.online#%#//scriptlet('no-setTimeout-if', 'hasAdblock')
ricasdelicias.online#$##player { display: block !important; }
```
